tasks.label: Cargo Clean all Crates
tasks.command: find . -name Cargo.toml -not -path "*-diff/*" -type f -exec dirname {} \; | xargs -t -I % cargo +nightly -C % clean

tasks.label: Corpus Reset
tasks.command: rm -rf ${workspaceFolder}/corpus && mkdir ${workspaceFolder}/corpus && cp ${workspaceFolder}/Corpus.zip ${workspaceFolder}/corpus/ && cd ${workspaceFolder}/corpus && unzip Corpus.zip && rm Corpus.zip && cd $OLDPWD
